ygData.subject: queynos and gate
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a necro in queynos, and none of the lovelies in my guild or the other guilds in my temple sell that gate spell.  I like the gate spell, it s a pretty darn
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a necro in queynos, and none of the lovelies in my guild or the other
guilds in my temple sell that gate spell. I like the gate spell, it's a
pretty darn usefull piece of work, and the happy mages and enchanters and
wizards in the surface guild...well..they don't like necros that much, and
of course won't sell to me. Anyone have any ideas where to get the spell?
I know doing the drosco quest can get you a random spell somtimes, but after
6 tries of it, I still have yet to get the gate spell. Anyhow, any imput
would be appreciated.

Cyrissa, Level 7 Necro, Veeshan
